metadata.title: CVE-2022-48655 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:firmware: arm_scmi: Harden accesses to the reset domains Accessing resetdomains descriptors by the index upon the SCMI drivers requests through theSCMI reset operations interface can potentially lead to out-of-boundviolations if the SCMI driver misbehave. Add an internal consistency checkbefore any such domains descriptors accesses.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
